name: motion
title: Motion
description: Search, create, and manage Motion tasks with powerful commands for capturing, organizing, and updating your work
author: edmundmiller

commands.name: capture-motion-task
commands.title: Capture Motion Task
commands.description: Create new Motion tasks with rich form inputs and smart defaults

commands.name: list-workspaces-projects
commands.title: List Workspaces & Projects
commands.description: Browse workspaces and projects to configure extension preferences

commands.name: quick-task-status
commands.title: Quick Task Status
commands.description: Quickly update task statuses with keyboard shortcuts

tools.name: create-motion-task
tools.title: Create Motion Task
tools.description: Create a new task in Motion with title, description, priority, duration, due date, and project assignment. This tool can understand natural language for dates and priorities.

tools.name: search-motion-tasks
tools.title: Search Motion Tasks
tools.description: Search for existing Motion tasks by name, status, priority, project, or assignee. Returns detailed task information including descriptions, due dates, and progress.

tools.name: update-task-status
tools.title: Update Task Status
tools.description: Update the status or priority of existing Motion tasks. Can mark tasks as complete, change priority levels, or update task assignments.

tools.name: get-task-summary
tools.title: Get Task Summary
tools.description: Get a summary of Motion tasks including today's tasks, overdue tasks, task counts by priority, and current workload analysis.

tools.name: search-projects
tools.title: Search Motion Projects
tools.description: Search for Motion projects and get project details including task counts, team members, and project status.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: Motion API Key
preferences.description: Your Motion API key from https://app.usemotion.com/settings/api

preferences.name: defaultWorkspaceId
preferences.title: Default Workspace ID
preferences.description: Default workspace ID for new tasks (optional - will use first workspace if not set)

preferences.name: defaultProjectId
preferences.title: Default Project ID
preferences.description: Default project ID for new tasks (optional)

preferences.name: defaultDuration
preferences.title: Default Duration (minutes)
preferences.description: Default duration for new tasks in minutes (e.g., 30, 60, 120)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
